title: Air Conditioning, On-Site Laundry Facilities, Ceiling Fan
posting_body: ['Quay Point Apartments', '3925 Arlington Square Dr, Houston, TX, 77034', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 69', 'OR Text', '69', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'AN ELEVATED STATE OF LIVING.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1230 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Conveniently located off of Galveston Road-Houston Boulevard and minutes away from Houston's best dining, shopping and entertainment, the Quay Point Apartments have it all!", 'Quay Point is best known for its beautiful landscaping and spacious one bedroom, two bedroom and studio apartments.', 'Outside, we invite you to float in the sparkling pool, take the kids to the playground or relax on your own private balcony.', 'Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is more than happy to assist with all of your needs.', 'Send us an email anytime and receive a timely response to any question you might have.', 'There is so much that the Quay Point community has to offer you.', 'So come experience all of the reasons why you should make Quay Point your new home today!', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Mini-Blinds', '- Tile Floor Throughout', '- Private Balconies/Patios', '- Air Conditioning', '- Dishwasher', '- Vertical Blinds', '- Full Size Washer/Dryer Connections', 'Community Amenities', '- Clubhouse', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Swimming Pool', '- Guest Parking Available', '- Off-Street Resident Parking', '- Controlled Access', '- Playground', '- On-Site Laundry Facilities', 'Office Hours', 'Mon - Fri 8:30am - 5:30pm', 'Sat 10:00am - 4:00pm', 'Sun Closed', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets Not Allowed.', 'X40Ra92FgR']
